siteDescription: Prepare for the IAEOZ Summit 2025 Puerto Rico! Join us for three days of engaging sessions focusing on Agriculture and Energy sectors. KDM & Associates will host the 6th annual IAEOZ Summit on October 13-14, 2025 in San Juan, Puerto Rico.

about.description: KDM & Associates will host the 6th annual IAEOZ Summit on October 13-14, 2025 in San Juan, Puerto Rico. The conference will be held in-person and livestreamed to a national and global audience.
highlights: Local Puerto Rican business and government leaders
U.S. Federal officials and international experts
Energy and agriculture, commerce, technology, and capital investment discussions
U.S. Government contracting opportunities for local MBEs
Puerto Rico as geographic and cultural crossroads

sessions.title: Welcome & Check-in
sessions.description: Stop by our welcome desk for your badge and check in. Follow Hotel Signage to our welcome booth.

sessions.title: Opening Showcase
sessions.description: Live Puerto Rican Music, Cultural Dance Performances and Refreshments

sessions.title: Keynote Address
sessions.description: Interim CEO, National Minority Supplier Development Council (NMSDC)

speakers.name: Don Cravins Jr.
speakers.title: President and CEO
speakers.bio: The Honorable Donald 'Don' R. Cravins, Jr. is the Interim President and CEO of the National Minority Supplier Development Council (NMSDC). A nationally recognized leader in public service, business development, and advocacy, he was named to the inaugural ForbesBLK 50 list for his impact and accomplishments. Previously served as the nation's first Under Secretary of Commerce for Minority Business Development.

speakers.name: Jose F. Nino
speakers.title: Chairman, Biofriendly / CEO
speakers.bio: José F. Niño is a seasoned leader in national and international business development with over 30 years of experience advancing Hispanic-owned enterprises. Former President and founding member of the U.S. Hispanic Chamber of Commerce (USHCC).

speakers.name: Frank Dixon
speakers.title: President of NAPEX / APEX, Program Director

speakers.name: Ramiro A. Cavazos
speakers.title: President & CEO
speakers.organization: United States Hispanic Chamber of Commerce

tickets.name: Hotel Reservation
tickets.description: Reserve a hotel room for your event at a special rate! Last day to book at group rate: September 13, 2025

sponsorshipPackages.name: Titanium Partnership Level
sponsorshipPackages.description: Position your brand as a national leader at the forefront of government contracting, innovation, and economic opportunity.
benefits: Sponsor 20 small businesses in Humanizing Government Contracting Program
Premium Video Podcast Feature with Timothy Maurice Webster
Featured in whitepapers and research reports
30 All-Access Passes, 30 VIP Networking Passes, 30 Reserved Seats

sponsorshipPackages.name: Platinum Partnership Level
sponsorshipPackages.tagline: Lead with Authority — Elevate Your Brand Presence
sponsorshipPackages.description: Partner at a premier level to increase visibility, showcase thought leadership, and support economic development.
benefits: 20 all-access passes, 20 VIP networking passes, 20 reserved seats

sponsorshipPackages.name: Gold Partnership Level
sponsorshipPackages.tagline: Partner in Progress — Showcase. Engage. Lead.
sponsorshipPackages.description: Position your organization as a key supporter of small business growth and innovation.
benefits: 10 all-access passes, 10 VIP networking passes, 10 reserved seats

sponsorshipPackages.name: Bronze Partnership Level
sponsorshipPackages.tagline: Support & Showcase — Engage the Right Way
sponsorshipPackages.description: A solid entry point for companies ready to participate, promote, and support small business development.

sponsorshipPackages.name: Silver Partnership Level
sponsorshipPackages.tagline: Support with Purpose — Align, Contribute, Empower
sponsorshipPackages.description: A strategic opportunity for emerging sponsors to engage directly with small businesses.
benefits: Brand featured in whitepapers and research reports
